roleset.name: sprinkle
roleset.note: SPRINKLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sprinkle' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from sprinkle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: sprinkle with
example.text: When the good fairy assigned to Slovakia hovered over the cradle of Edita Gruberova many years ago in Bratislava, she sprinkled her with high E flats, sparkling Ds, clean trills, and coloratura ornaments silvery as magic dust.
example.arg: with high E flats, sparkling Ds, clean trills, and coloratura ornaments silvery as magic dust

example.name: sprinkle on
example.text: John sprinkled gooey chocolate pudding on Mary's back.

roleset.name: weather phenomenon
roleset.note: SPRINKLE-V NOTES: Hooray, our first zero-valency verb!. VN class weather-57. (from sprinkle.02-v)

role.descr: Cognate object, mention of what is sprinkled, raindrops
